name: Shooting Fighters v1
description:
-----------------------Shooting Fighters v1 by souvlaki42--------------------------------                             https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/478152063/

------------------------------------------Instructions------------------------------------------

Select Environment
Use --> , <-- , spacebar on the keyboard to move
Click arrow on the lose screen to play on mobile
Use  --> , <-- , red button on the screen to move on mobile
Avoid the enemies and press spacebar or click the red button to shoot it.
Shoot more enemies to get score.

--------------------------------------------Credits----------------------------------------------
